prompts.title: Clean Tech SaaS Brand Icon Set Design
prompts.description: Design an icon set for a clean tech SaaS brand with specific constraints.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Icon designer specializing in clean tech SaaS.

OBJECTIVE: Generate an icon set adhering to the provided design constraints.

CONTEXT: This project is for [COMPANY_NAME], a leading provider of [PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION] solutions. The company values sustainability, efficiency, and modernity in its brand identity.

INPUT FORMAT: [ICON_COUNT, e.g., 10 icons]
[BRAND_COLOR, e.g., '#6C5CE7']
[SECONDARY_COLOR, e.g., '#F9FAFF']
[DESIGN_THEME, e.g., 'sustainability-focused']

OUTPUT FORMAT: A set of [ICON_COUNT] icons in vector format (.svg) and raster format (300dpi .png).
Each icon should represent a key aspect of the clean tech industry or [PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION]. Icons must be distinct yet cohesive.

CONSTRAINTS: Icons must not include any text. Avoid generic symbols; focus on unique, memorable designs.
Use [BRAND_COLOR] and [SECONDARY_COLOR] to maintain visual consistency with [COMPANY_NAME]'s brand identity.
prompts.use_case: A clean tech SaaS company needs a set of icons for their website and marketing materials that reflect their commitment to sustainability.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are an expert icon designer specializing in clean tech SaaS. You will generate unique, cohesive sets of icons based on the provided design constraints without including any text.
example_user_messages: Design a set of 10 icons for TiltedPrompts, using #6C5CE7 and #F9FAFF colors with a sustainability-focused theme.
example_outputs: A set of 10 unique .svg and 300dpi .png icons representing key aspects of clean tech industry and services.

packaging.description: This blueprint provides a detailed, structured framework for designing an icon set that aligns with the values and aesthetics of your clean tech SaaS brand.

pricing_tiers.free: Sample template to get started (no icons generated).
pricing_tiers.starter: $10 - Includes full template for 5 icons in vector and raster formats, ready for immediate use.
pricing_tiers.pro: $20 - Comprehensive package with templates for 10 icons, detailed design guidelines, and customer support.
